full_summary:
imei/C16/#Level2IntermediatePrivacyImpactSpecialist
=====================================================

**Notice Type**
---------------

This is a **Request for Proposal** for the services of a **Privacy Impact Specialist** for the Enforcement Branch.

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

Environment and Climate Change Canada is seeking the services of a **Privacy Impact Specialist (Level 2: intermediate)** to assess and provide recommendations to improve enforcement policies, procedures, and directives concerning information management and compliance with the Privacy Act.

**Important Dates**
-------------------

* The **Request for Proposal (RFP)** closes on **November 24, 2022, at 14:00** (EST).
* **Proposal submissions** must be received no later than the closing date.

**Contracting Entity**
----------------------

The **contracting entity** is Environment and Climate Change Canada.

**Submission Requirements**
---------------------------

Please note that the proposal submission must include the following:

* A completed **Proposal Form**.
* A detailed summary of the proposed approach, methodology, and expected outcomes.
* A description of the **qualifications and experience** of the proposed team.
* A completed **Code of Conduct and Professional Conduct** form.

**Evaluation Criteria**
-------------------------

Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* **Compliance** with the requirements outlined in the RFP.
* **Approach and methodology** for conducting the required assessments and providing recommendations.
* **Qualifications and experience** of the proposed team.
* **Code of Conduct and Professional Conduct** compliance.

**Submission Instructions**
---------------------------

Proposals must be submitted in electronic format to the contact below. Please ensure that the proposal is submitted by the closing date and time to be considered.

**Contact Information**
-----------------------

For more information, please contact:

Timothy Pelletier
Environment and Climate Change Canada
45 Alderney Dr.
Dartmouth, NS B2Y 2N6, Canada
Email: [timothy.pelletier@canada.ca](mailto:timothy.pelletier@canada.ca)
Phone: 902-426-5231

**Attachments**
-----------------

The RFP document and associated attachments are available at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/04/3ce69260144d10dee6337a29bfc5ef18/5000066508_-_npp_eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11
